headline.main: The Farm Bill, Beyond the Farm

docs.abstract: In this sprawling legislation, what is missing that should be added? What is in the bill but should be eliminated?

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration, in a continuation of its efforts to curb childhood obesity, plans to set nationwide guidelines to promote healthy choices in schools.

headline.seo: New Rules Planned on School Vending Machines
headline.main: New Guidelines Planned on School Vending Machines
headline.print_headline: New Guidelines Planned on School Vending Machines

docs.abstract: Obama administration, in a continuation of its efforts to reduce childhood obesity, plans to set nationwide guidelines to promote healthy choices for foods that children buy at school outside of the cafeteria; many believe that new rules, which are likely to restrict sugar-, salt- and fat-laden snacks sold in vending machines, will trigger another fight between health advocates and the food industry.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration, in a continuation of its efforts to curb childhood obesity, plans to set nationwide guidelines to promote healthy choices in schools.

docs.lead_paragraph: This dish focuses on hearty grains and assertive vegetables, so one chicken breast is all it takes to feed a family.

docs.lead_paragraph: A study has found that consumption of omega-3 fatty acids from fish is associated with a reduced risk for one kind of colon polyp, but only in women.

headline.seo: Fish Help Reduce Risk of One Kind of Colon Polyp in Women
headline.main: Prevention: Fish Helps Reduce Risk of Polyps in Women
headline.print_headline: Prevention: Fish Helps Reduce Risk of Polyps in Women

docs.abstract: Dr Harvey J Murff study in The American Journal of Clinical Nutrition finds that consumption of omega-3 fatty acids from fish is associated with a reduced risk for one kind of colon polyp in women.
docs.snippet: A study has found that consumption of omega-3 fatty acids from fish is associated with a reduced risk for one kind of colon polyp, but only in women.

docs.lead_paragraph: A randomized study of 144 people put on low-calorie diets found that those given a high-carb, protein-rich breakfast with a dessert lost more weight and kept it off.

headline.seo: Dessert at Breakfast May Help Dieters
headline.main: Nutrition: Dessert at Breakfast May Help Dieters
headline.print_headline: Nutrition: Dessert at Breakfast May Help Dieters

docs.abstract: Dr Daniela Jakubowicz study in journal Steroids finds that a low-calorie meal plan that includes dessert with breakfast may help dieters lose additional weight.
docs.snippet: A randomized study of 144 people put on low-calorie diets found that those given a high-carb, protein-rich breakfast with a dessert lost more weight and kept it off.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few weeks ago, a friend showed up for a run with a CamelBak - one of those humplike backpacks with a tube that allows you to sip liquid - and a belt containing food to eat along the way. Every 20 minutes or so as we ran, he stopped to eat and drink, sprinting afterward to catch up. Now that is unusual, I thought. Does it really help to eat so often during a 16-mile run?

headline.main: Personal Best: Workouts May Not Be the Best Time for a Snack

docs.lead_paragraph: Districts across Texas are selling advertisements on buses, athletic stadiums and other pieces of school property to help make up for some of the money lost through state budget cuts.

headline.seo: Texas Schools Turn to Ads in Search of Needed Money
headline.main: Seeking Money, Texas Schools Turn to Advertisements
headline.print_headline: Seeking Money, Schools Turn to Advertisements

docs.snippet: Districts across Texas are selling advertisements on buses, athletic stadiums and other pieces of school property to help make up for some of the money lost through state budget cuts.
